Toward infinity
and beyond

Discover your new favourite mascot. With her, boost your imagination and decorate your workspace. May Cornelia accompany you in your daily life and in the most perilous missions you may encounter. With her, give yourself the means to succeed, believe in yourself and in your dreams!

Choose
your destiny

Each unicorn has its own personality and symbolism. Get to know your new mascot and surround yourself with a strong ally. Thus choose the brave one and you will be able to face any situation. Take the sweet Cornelia and protect your health. If you need more luck, meet the Magic Cornelia! If youâ€™re born to be bold, choose the Impetuous Cornelia : nothing will defeat you.

Always
Go futher

Decline Cornelia as you wish! Black, dark grey, white, light grey, prussian blue ... Choose your colour, size and characteristics! And if that's not enough, personalise it to make it unique, in your own image. So open up the field of possibilities, the world is yours !

Let the magic happen

Surround yourself with the most faithful companions and embark together on fantastic new adventures! Pocket, medium or XXL format, find the Cornelia that best suits your environment.

Oh, and don't worry: Cornelia feeds on your bad vibes, no need to give her water or grass !
